body:
Hey guys.

I remeber having a conversation with a few guys on Teamspeak a while back about what time we started and finished school. The results were all different for each person.

So I thought I'd get everyone amongst it so we can see how different our school days are to one another. 

I guess I'll share mine first.

8:15-2:45
But I usually stay at school until around 3:30-4:00
body_tagged:

But I usually stay at school until around 3:30-4:00
title: How long is your school day?

replies.body: Doors open at 7:00 (for all the activites in the morning like band and choir), and school offical starts at 8:26 and ends at 3:00
replies.body_tagged: Doors open at 7:00 (for all the activites in the morning like band and choir), and school offical starts at 8:26 and ends at 3:00

replies.body: My doors open at 7:30 and cools starts around 8:35 and I get out at around 3:20. All of this is EST
replies.body_tagged: My doors open at 7:30 and cools starts around 8:35 and I get out at around 3:20. All of this is EST

replies.body: 6.5 hours. Starts at 9:00 and ends at 3:30
replies.body_tagged: 6.5 hours. Starts at 9:00 and ends at 3:30

replies.body:
7:08AM - 1:58PM

our schedule is  different from most schools.
we have "even and odd" block schedule
Odd Day
Period 1: 7:15-8:53
Period 3: 9:00 - 10:38
Period 5: 10:45-11:36
Lunch: 11:36-12:13
Period 7: 12:20-1:58

Even day:
Period 2: 7:15-8:53
Period 4: 9:00 - 10:38
Period 5: 10:45-11:36 (every day)
Lunch: 11:36-12:13
Period 6: 12:20-1:58

Full day is every class
Testing days are hell.
2 hours each class

Testing odd day: periods 1, 3, lunch,  7 - all two hours long  (exept lunch)
Testing Even day: periods 2, 4, lunch, 6 - all two hours long (exept lunch)
Testing full day: periods 5, 1, 2, 3, 4, lunch, 5, 6, 7
First period 5: 2 hours
Periods 1-7: 30 minutes 

and I have math, English, and history on even day. 2 hours in all those classes q_q
replies.body_tagged:
7:08AM - 1:58PM

our schedule is  different from most schools.
we have "even and odd" block schedule
Odd Day
Period 1: 7:15-8:53
Period 3: 9:00 - 10:38
Period 5: 10:45-11:36
Lunch: 11:36-12:13
Period 7: 12:20-1:58

Even day:
Period 2: 7:15-8:53
Period 4: 9:00 - 10:38
Period 5: 10:45-11:36 (every day)
Lunch: 11:36-12:13
Period 6: 12:20-1:58

Full day is every class
Testing days are hell.
2 hours each class

Testing odd day: periods 1, 3, lunch,  7 - all two hours long  (exept lunch)
Testing Even day: periods 2, 4, lunch, 6 - all two hours long (exept lunch)
Testing full day: periods 5, 1, 2, 3, 4, lunch, 5, 6, 7
First period 5: 2 hours
Periods 1-7: 30 minutes 

and I have math, English, and history on even day. 2 hours in all those classes q_q

replies.body: 8:35 - 5:00 (6:30 if I go home late), have to wake up around 6:45
replies.body_tagged: 8:35 - 5:00 (6:30 if I go home late), have to wake up around 6:45

replies.body: Homeroom begins at 8:35am with actual classes starting at around 8.45-9.15. Then we finish up at 3:10pm
replies.body_tagged: Homeroom begins at 8:35am with actual classes starting at around 8.45-9.15. Then we finish up at 3:10pm

replies.body: Well... When sports teams have practice in the morning the doors open at 6AM. Other days it's 7 for the other activities. Otherwise school starts at 8:09AM and ends at 2:35PM. We have 6, 61 minute classes. Non semestered so it's not the same classes every day :c (We learn all subjects in a whole school year, not split in two semesters.
replies.body_tagged: Well... When sports teams have practice in the morning the doors open at 6AM. Other days it's 7 for the other activities. Otherwise school starts at 8:09AM and ends at 2:35PM. We have 6, 61 minute classes. Non semestered so it's not the same classes every day :c (We learn all subjects in a whole school year, not split in two semesters.

replies.body:
8:00am-2:35pm

The DOE standards changed this year :c
A couple of years ago, it would be from 8:00am-2:15 pm everyday except Wednesday. Wednesdays would get off at 1:30 pm.

replies.body: Mt schools doors open at 7 A.M and I usually get dropped off from 7:20-7:40 A.M orchestra starts at 7:30 and ends at 8:10ish  I'm not in orchestra yet. School starts at 8:10 and classes end at 3:20, but by the time you pack up and everything it's around 3:35. Then, I might have an after school choir group and/or play rehersal and/or sports practices /games (away or home) so I might get home anywhere from 4 to 7pm or 10/11 pm during tech week for the play. So yea... it can get pretty busy at times. So the school day is from 8:10 am to 3:20 pm but I can be at school from 7:20 to 11 pm sometimes... Well, it's not really that bad, it keeps me busy and I get to do things I like :P
replies.body_tagged: Mt schools doors open at 7 A.M and I usually get dropped off from 7:20-7:40 A.M orchestra starts at 7:30 and ends at 8:10ish  I'm not in orchestra yet. Then, I might have an after school choir group and/or play rehersal and/or sports practices /games (away or home) so I might get home anywhere from 4 to 7pm or 10/11 pm during tech week for the play. So yea... it can get pretty busy at times. So the school day is from 8:10 am to 3:20 pm but I can be at school from 7:20 to 11 pm sometimes... Well, it's not really that bad, it keeps me busy and I get to do things I like :P

replies.body:
Monday from 9.50 am to 3.30 pm,
Tuesday from 8.00 am to 1.15 pm,
Wednesday from 8.00 to 3.30 pm,
Thursday from 8.00 to 3.30 pm,
Friday from 8.00 to 3.30 pm or longer, depends on how much fun I have xD
Normally I get a 45 mins break at 1.15 pm
